caption: Table 1: Quantitative comparisons. We compare our MagicTailor with SOTA methods of personalization based on automatic metrics and user study. The best results are marked in bold.
description: Table 1 presents a quantitative comparison of MagicTailor against state-of-the-art methods for personalization, using both automatic metrics and a user study to evaluate text alignment, identity fidelity, and generation quality.

caption: Table 2: Ablation of key techniques. Our DM-Deg and DS-Bal effectively contribute to a superior performance trade-off.
description: Table 2 shows the impact of the Dynamic Masked Degradation (DM-Deg) and Dual-Stream Balancing (DS-Bal) techniques on the performance of the MagicTailor model.
